nl.fw.yapool

Class BeanClone

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.fw.yapool.BeanClone

  • public class BeanClone
extends Object
    Utility methods for (un)serializing and (un)gzipping objects. Any thrown checked exceptions are re-thrown as a runtime exception.
    Author:
    Fred

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BeanClone.GZIPBestOutputStream
      A GZIPOutputStream that uses Deflater.BEST_COMPRESSION.

      static int BUFFER_SIZE
      Default byte-buffer size for streams used in this class (512 bytes, also default for GZIP streams).
      protected static org.slf4j.Logger log
